other_tests.findings: No cancer found in biopsy specimens from the proximal right main bronchus and origin of the intermediate bronchus.
Identified a 1 Ã— 1-cm polypoid intraluminal adenocarcinoma localized in the distal esophagus, 30 cm from the incisors, without gastric involvement or extramural infiltration.
All bronchial, digestive, and lymph node samples were tumor-free.

Well-differentiated squamous cell lung carcinoma with one peribronchial metastatic lymph node (pT2 N1, stage IIB) and esophageal adenocarcinoma (pT1 N0) associated with Barrett columnar-lined epithelium.
